H0.text: The substances isoflurane, desflurane, nitrous oxide, and sevoflurane are used as what in medicine. Pain Reliever

H1.text: The substances isoflurane, desflurane, nitrous oxide, and sevoflurane are used as what in medicine. Muscle Relaxant

H2.text: The substances isoflurane, desflurane, nitrous oxide, and sevoflurane are used as what in medicine. Anti-Inflammatory

H3.text: The substances isoflurane, desflurane, nitrous oxide, and sevoflurane are used as what in medicine. Anesthetic

A4.text: Isoflurane is indicated for induction and maintenance of general anesthesia.

A5.text: Isoflurane, sold under the brand name Forane among others, is a halogenated ether used as a general anesthetic.
